title: Add contact email to enrollment form

requirements.text: In the EnrollmentSection component, display the email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com prominently on the inquiry/waitlist form — either as a visible 'Or email us directly at' line near the submit button or as a styled callout above or below the form fields — so prospective athletes can contact the clinic directly.

quotes: yes waitlist form to email us at athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com

acceptanceCriteria: The email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com is visibly displayed within the EnrollmentSection form area.
The email is rendered as a clickable mailto: link.
The email display is styled consistently with the existing dark/amber visual theme.
The rest of the form fields and submit button remain unchanged and functional.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
No backend changes required — form submissions already persist to the backend canister.
Do not attempt to wire up email sending or SMTP; only display the address as a contact option.
nonGoals: Automated email delivery or forwarding of form submissions to athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com.
Any changes to the backend schema or submitInquiry method.
Adding new form fields beyond what already exists.
